item.title: Philly Pasta Carbonara
item.description: Ingredients for 6 600 g spaghetti 6 rashers bacon cut into stripes 180 g Philadelphia Light 2 egg yolks 3 stalks flat parsley leaves picked and chopped 300 ml vegetable stock shavings of parmesan to garnish Instructions 1 Step Cook the pasta according to the pack instructions. While it’s cooking fry the bacon pieces in a large pan, add the veg stock and simmer for a few minutes till the liquid is reduced by half.
